page.title: 04The Voe Show.
page.content: The Voe Agricultural Show is an annual event which is held in August.Anyone from the district can enter animals, knitwear,homebakes,craft work,flowers and vegetables into the show. The entries are displayed in the hall,a nissen hut and three tents.250 pens are available to house the animals. The best entries are rewarded with cups,shields and money prizes. Altogether there are 30 cups and shields to be won. A variety of side shows are provided for the children.Pony rides are a great attraction as is the sheep shearing competition and the tug of war. The Voe Show restarted in 1981 after a lapse of 50 years and is now one of the main events of the summer.People flock from all over Shetland on that day for a very enjoyable outing.
